text: Lego Duplo (also called Lego Preschool, Explore or simply just DUPLO) is another type of Lego toys. The difference is that they are bigger than regular Lego and that they are meant for ages 1Â½-6, because they are easier to handle than regular Lego. Lego Duplo were launched in 1969. Category:Lego
title: Lego Duplo
